Entries.default: "Sooey! Sooooey!"
"Watcher, I implore you, don't let Edér adopt another piglet - for its sake and ours."
"Captain, I demand a piglet for our menagerie. Feel free to wrangle one if the opportunity presents itself."
"Ishi, go bring mama back some pork."
"If they weren't summoned out of soul stuff, I'd say they'd be good eating."
"Time to chop the pork!"
"Why is everyone on this island so obsessed with pigs?"
"Fighting pigs for the joy of a crowd. Such a noble errand."
"I bet the crew'd love some fresh pork."
"Every year in Lipasalis we have a competition to catch pigs. I have won four times."
"Here piggy piggy piggy."
"You'd think that statue could summon up the whole person."
"Focus on breaking their bones - they've no flesh to pierce or slice."
"I've got your back, captain. Let's give these fiends a battle to remember."
"Skeletons. I hate skeletons. I'd fight my own if I could."
"I'll reap them in the name of Gaun."
"The thrice-damned blight of the seas high and low."
"There are vessels in the White that Wends that... no, this is not the time."
"These fiends are already dead. Mission accomplished, ac?"
"Why do they always gotta look like they're grinning?"
"Whoever gets the most skulls wins!"
"Skellies! I love the sound they make when you smash 'em!"
"Burn them from the face of Eora."
"Is Ydwin going to become one of these things? I suppose I must respect her commitment."
"I might need a dip in the bathhouse after this one, captain."
"Ain't nothing left for you here. Let me show you the light!"
"And missing all the best bits, the poor bastards."
"I do not seek your approval, fish prince."
"Th- there are far fouler beasts than these!"
"A pitiful sight, these creatures. Let us put them down, casità."
"Damn, I'd almost feel sorry for 'em if they weren't planning to, uh, devour my soul."
"Let us kill them fast."
"Ain't exactly handsome fellas, are they?"
"Mind yourselves - the scent of ooze never washes out."
"Be prepared for anything."
"I just cleaned my armor, captain."
"Ugh. Again?"
"Be keeping a weather eye open!"
"I have no wish to be digested today. Let's be done with this quickly."
"Suffocated in ooze gunk - now that's a bad way to go."
"Look how they move!"
"Spooooooky."
"That they would summon spirits for their entertainment. Desgant."
"So should I aim at the head, or does it even matter?"
"Time to light the way through the darkness!"
"I be thinking these sad blokes died here..."
"They're artificial. Each contains fragments of many souls."
"Rymrgand awaits you, spirits."
"So cold... Feels like they have drained the life out of the air."
"Yes! More ghosts to punch!"
"Hit them on the clangy bit."
"Are the joints the optimum target, or the head?"
"Seek the weaknesses in their plating. If there are any."
"Back to Abydon with you!"
"Don't be seeing a lot of these at sea. Too like to sink."
"Care to convince them to treat us as Bertenno?"
"Shouldn't these be guarding some temple somewhere?"
"Arkemyr made me polish his ironclads. I know these brutes inside and out."
"You think my songs'll work on 'em if the don't have ears?"
"Machines? But that is no challenge at all!"
"Ugh, Benweth were obsessed with these!"
"I hope there ain't a test after."
"Finally, a prize worth fighting for!"
"Perhaps these notes were better lost, ac?"
"Captain, I will protect this parchment with my life."
"This brings me back to Kana defending his thesis at the lore college."
"This will be good practice for when the Aedyrans come."
"Do we get to keep the research notes when we're done?"
"Don't let anything happen to the notes - Fassina's gonna want 'em."
"If you want this paper, it is yours, my friend!"
"I got real mixed feelings about this."
"Focus, Edér."
"Let us answer the age-old question of bear versus shark, shall we?"
"What we need is a distraction. You got any more of that good shark meat?"
"Seemed good enough lads and lasses, cap, but now they be the enemy. Sail straight."
"Their bonds with their beasts are strong. You can twist it to your advantage."
"They're not even snow bears!"
"You ever wish Ishi was a bear, Maia?"
"Can you also become a bear, Tekēhu?"
"I'm suddenly feeling a bit inadequate."
"I wouldn't mind being an ooze. No one can make you wear clothes - you'd just slide right out of them!"
"These are twisted, fractured souls. Let's shatter them!"
"Now there's a fine idea! Can you put me in one of those, Watcher?"
"Can I hit the shadows?"
"Ready, Watcher? Not that you've got a lot of choice in the matter."
"Fye, lat's hae't out, than!"
"For the Republics!"
"Let me know where you want me, captain. I am ready."
"Ready when you are, captain."
"Got my sickle sharpened for the harvest."
"Ain't normally one for exhibitionism, but let's be giving them a show, aye?!"
"Your end shall be slow and painful!"
"Time to put what I learned from Arkemyr to the test."
"Don't get cocky!"
"Tell me what to hit!"
"Ke ni tehun seliki hidu gawu."
"Drinks after, aye?"
"Everything's got a soul."
"Winner's the one that blinds the most eyes, Maia. The thing's got eyes, aye?"
"Hey Serafen, want to make this interesting? Whoever dies first has to haunt the captain."
"I've got your back, Fassina!"
"Caution will serve us better than speed!"
